languages.text: The Navigator heals {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains +1 additional wound for every Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} taken. The healing increases by +1 for every creature killed in between the Navigator's turns.
languages.original_text: Навигатор восстанавливает {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g} в начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} и получает +1 дополнительного здоровья за каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талант{/g} навигатора. Исцеление увеличивается на 1 за каждое существо, убитое за время между ходами навигатора.

traits.locale_text: The Navigator heals <u>(Willpower bonus)</u> wounds at the beginning of every turn and gains +1 additional wound for every Navigator's talent taken. The healing increases by +1 for every creature killed between the Navigator's turns.

The Navigator heals <u>Willpower bonus</u> wounds at the beginning of every turn and gains +1 additional wound for every Navigator talent taken. The healing increases by +1 for every creature killed in between the Navigator's turns.

The healing increases by +1 for every creature killed in between the Navigator's turns.

traits.locale_text: Навигатор восстанавливает <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВОЛ</u> здоровья в начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} и получает +1 дополнительного здоровья за каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талант{/g} навигатора. Исцеление увеличивается на 1 за каждое существо, убитое за время между ходами навигатора.

Исцеление увеличивается на 1 за каждое существо, убитое за время между ходами навигатора.

Навигатор восстанавливает {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} здоровья в начале каждого своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} и получает +1 дополнительного здоровья за каждый {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талант{/g} навигатора. Исцеление увеличивается на 1 за каждое существо, убитое за время между ходами навигатора.

languages.text: 导航者在每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时都会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，恢复的生命值等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}。每获得一个导航者{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，都会额外恢复1点生命值。此外，在导航者的两个回合之间，每有一个生物死亡，此效果都会额外恢复1点生命值。
languages.original_text: The Navigator heals {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains +1 additional wound for every Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} taken. The healing increases by +1 for every creature killed in between the Navigator's turns.

traits.locale_text: 导航者在每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时都会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，恢复的生命值等同于<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。每获得一个导航者{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，都会额外恢复1点生命值。此外，在导航者的两个回合之间，每有一个生物死亡，此效果都会额外恢复1点生命值。

导航者在每个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时都会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}，恢复的生命值等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}。每获得一个导航者{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}，都会额外恢复1点生命值。此外，在导航者的两个回合之间，每有一个生物死亡，此效果都会额外恢复1点生命值。

languages.text: El navegante se cura {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y gana +1 herida adicional por cada {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} de navegante adquirido. La curación aumenta en +1 por cada criatura que haya sido eliminada entre los turnos del navegante.
languages.original_text: The Navigator heals {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains +1 additional wound for every Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} taken. The healing increases by +1 for every creature killed in between the Navigator's turns.

traits.locale_text: El navegante se cura <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y gana +1 herida adicional por cada {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} de navegante adquirido. La curación aumenta en +1 por cada criatura que haya sido eliminada entre los turnos del navegante.

El navegante se cura {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} al comienzo de cada {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} y gana +1 herida adicional por cada {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} de navegante adquirido. La curación aumenta en +1 por cada criatura que haya sido eliminada entre los turnos del navegante.

languages.text: Der Navigator heilt {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zu Beginn jedem {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} und erhält +1 zusätzliche Wunde für jedes gewählte {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} des Navigators. Die Heilung erhöht sich um +1 für jede Kreatur, die zwischen den Zügen des Navigators getötet wird.
languages.original_text: The Navigator heals {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains +1 additional wound for every Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} taken. The healing increases by +1 for every creature killed in between the Navigator's turns.

traits.locale_text: Der Navigator heilt <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zu Beginn jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} und erhält +1 zusätzliche Wunde für jedes gewählte {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} des Navigators. Die Heilung erhöht sich um +1 für jede Kreatur, die zwischen den Runden des Navigators getötet wird.

Der Navigator heilt {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} zu Beginn jeder {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} und erhält +1 zusätzliche Wunde für jedes gewählte {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} des Navigators. Die Heilung erhöht sich um +1 für jede Kreatur, die zwischen den Runden des Navigators getötet wird.

languages.text: Le navigateur soigne {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et obtient +1 blessure supplémentaire pour chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} de navigateur pris. Les soins augmentent de +1 par créature éliminée entre les tours du navigateur.
languages.original_text: The Navigator heals {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains +1 additional wound for every Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} taken. The healing increases by +1 for every creature killed in between the Navigator's turns.

traits.locale_text: Le Navigateur soigne <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}</u> {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et obtient +1 blessure supplémentaire pour chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} de Navigateur pris. Les soins augmentent de +1 par créature éliminée entre les tours du Navigateur.

Le Navigateur soigne {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} au début de chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} et obtient +1 blessure supplémentaire pour chaque {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} de Navigateur pris. Les soins augmentent de +1 par créature éliminée entre les tours du Navigateur.

languages.text: 航宙士は毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}回復し、航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}1個につき追加の傷を1獲得する。この回復量は、航宙士のターンの間で倒された敵生物1体につき+1増加する。
languages.original_text: The Navigator heals {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains +1 additional wound for every Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} taken. The healing increases by +1 for every creature killed in between the Navigator's turns.

traits.locale_text: 航宙士は毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}を{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}回復し、航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}能力{/g}1個につき追加の傷を1獲得する。この回復量は、航宙士のターンの間で倒された敵生物1体につき+1増加する。
航宙士は毎{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時に、{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}を{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}分回復し、航宙士の{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}1個につき追加体力を1得る。この回復量は、航宙士のターンの間で倒された敵生物1体につき+1される。

languages.text: Rotacı, her {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turun{/g} başlangıcında {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı iyileşir ve alınan her Rotacı {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerisi{/g} için +1 ilave sağlık puanı kazanır. Rotacı'nın iki turu arasında öldürülen her yaratık için tazelenen sağlık puanı +1 artar.
languages.original_text: The Navigator heals {unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} at the beginning of every {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} and gains +1 additional wound for every Navigator {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} taken. The healing increases by +1 for every creature killed in between the Navigator's turns.
